channel.description: Week 8 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 7 Due 11:59 PM Wed: Week 7 Response 11:59 PM Fri: Final Project 11:59 PM TEVALS! Lab 7 Grading No Meeting Required 1: Screenshots 2: Zip File & Readme 3: Monitoring URL 4: GitLab & URL EC: Screenshots Final Project Completion Written Report - Use Template Research, Propose & SWOT Analysis Include Graphics & Data As Needed Live Presentation - 15-30 minutes Convince Me You've Analyzed It Well Small Prototype - Should be Easy Spend 2-4 Hours on Prototype Presentation Live or Pre-recorded Present on or before Friday Schedule Now!
